abstract: The Walt Disney Co. on Thursday detailed some of the programs that will make up Disney XD, a retooled version of the Toon Disney cable channel that will debut next February.
lead_paragraph: The Walt Disney Co. on Thursday detailed some of the programs that will make up Disney XD, a retooled version of the Toon Disney cable channel that will debut next February.

headline.main: Miley Cyrus for Boys? Disney Hopes So.
